verses.t: Give{H3051} Lordunto the {H3068}, O ye mighty{H410}, give{H3051} Lordunto the {H3068} glory{H3519} and strength{H5797}.ye mighty: Heb. ye sons of the mighty

Give{H3051} Lordunto the {H3068} the glory{H3519} due unto his name{H8034}; worship{H7812} Lordthe {H3068} in the beauty{H1927} of holiness{H6944}.the glory…: Heb. the honour of his namein…: or, in his glorious sanctuary
The voice{H6963} Lordof the {H3068} is upon the waters{H4325}: the God{H410} of glory{H3519} thundereth{H7481}: Lordthe {H3068} is upon many{H7227} waters{H4325}.many: or, great
The voice{H6963} Lordof the {H3068} is powerful{H3581}; the voice{H6963} Lordof the {H3068} is full of majesty{H1926}.powerful: Heb. in powerfull…: Heb. in majesty
The voice{H6963} Lordof the {H3068} breaketh{H7665} the cedars{H730}; Lordyea, the {H3068} breaketh{H7665} the cedars{H730} of Lebanon{H3844}.
He maketh them also to skip{H7540} like a calf{H5695}; Lebanon{H3844} and Sirion{H8303} like a young{H1121} unicorn{H7214}.
The voice{H6963} Lordof the {H3068} divideth{H2672} the flames{H3852} of fire{H784}.divideth: Heb. cutteth out
The voice{H6963} Lordof the {H3068} shaketh{H2342} the wilderness{H4057}; Lordthe {H3068} shaketh{H2342} the wilderness{H4057} of Kadesh{H6946}.

The voice{H6963} Lordof the {H3068} maketh the hinds{H355} to calve{H2342}, and discovereth{H2834} the forests{H3295}: and in his temple{H1964} doth every one speak{H559} of his glory{H3519}.to calve: or, to be in paindoth…: or, every whit of it uttereth, etc
LordThe {H3068} sitteth{H3427} upon the flood{H3999}; Lordyea, the {H3068} sitteth{H3427} King{H4428} for ever{H5769}.
LordThe {H3068} will give{H5414} strength{H5797} unto his people{H5971}; Lordthe {H3068} will bless{H1288} his people{H5971} with peace{H7965}.
